subMenus.title: Godless, Good, & Gracious
subMenus.tagLine: (We Devils are grateful for all of you; Thank you for making our demon dreams a reality!)

menuItems.title: Diners, Drive-ins & Ryes
menuItems.description: A toasted rye bread, bourbon & rum milk punch with chipotle maple coffee.
menuItems.tagLine: It's top of the list for a reason. A milk punch built to invoke that perfect smell of a diner.

menuItems.title: Just the (Spruce) Tip,
menuItems.description: St George Terroir gin, Norden’s Aquavit, Devil-made spruce syrup, lemon, seltzer, cava.
menuItems.tagLine: I have a spruce tree in my backyard and now you could have that same tree in your glass.

menuItems.title: BabaDinDin
menuItems.description: Mint-washed aged rum, Beefeater gin, lime, demerara, Angostura bitters, cava, mint.
menuItems.tagLine: An Old Cuban riff that will make you forget it's winter outside.

menuItems.title: By The Horns,
menuItems.description: Tequila, nutmeg infused dry curacao, dry vermouth, orange bitters.
menuItems.tagLine: A stirred tequila drink to stir things inside you.

menuItems.title: Black Metal Lana
menuItems.description: River Revolution Rye, Fernet Vexia, BBCO Folk Metal stout syrup, Aztec bitters, saline.
menuItems.tagLine: It’s dark, it’s strong, it goes hard.

menuItems.title: Apricot With Your Pants Down,
menuItems.description: Apricot brandy, cognac, lemon, tonka syrup, egg white, Angostura bitters.
menuItems.tagLine: This beautifully crafted winter sour will make you question why you were ever wary of egg white drinks.

menuItems.title: Call Your Mom
menuItems.description: Cardamom-infused 10 year single malt Scotch, blanc vermouth, coconut-washed Campari
menuItems.tagLine: I wish we could freeze it into ice blocks and ice skate on it and then melt it in the spring and drink it!

menuItems.title: All Rum is Drama
menuItems.description: Devil’s rum blend, cinnamon-star anise-coffee syrup, crushed ice, Mexican Coca-Cola, coconut whipped cream, burnt cinnamon

menuItems.title: Heart On My Sleeve
menuItems.description: Beefeater gin, St. Elizabeth’s Allspice Dram, Devil-made local apple syrup, fresh lemon juice, egg white, cream.
menuItems.tagLine: (Ramos Gin Fizz-style, can take up to 10 minutes to make)

menuItems.title: Para Tú Amor
menuItems.description: Reposado tequila, Linchpin Aperitivo (Aperol-esque local spirit), strawberry purée, fresh lemon juice, tonka syrup, sparkling wine.

menuItems.title: French Mistress
menuItems.description: Cantaloupe infused Aviation gin, cava, lemon, mint, agave

menuItems.title: Sexting on the Beach
menuItems.description: Vodka, oak-infused peach liqueur, sour orange, Devil-made cranberry cordial.

menuItems.title: # of the Beets
menuItems.description: 10 year old Scotch infused with 666 grams of beets, cognac, Drambuie, cardamom bitters

menuItems.title: A Gift Certificate to OnlyFans
menuItems.description: Flor de Cana 7yr Rum, Mad River Vanilla Rum, passionfruit, lemon, coconut, vanilla syrup, 'Billy's hot pepper juice', Lambrusco float.

menuItems.title: Notorious F.I.G.
menuItems.description: Fig-infused cognac, Grand Marnier, house grenadine, lemon.

menuItems.title: She's Made of Oak
menuItems.description: Rittenhouse Rye, Underberg, Bigallet China-China, chipotle maple, Angostura bitters, oak smoke

menuItems.title: New Calendar
menuItems.description: Jalapeno infused Banhez Mezcal, Dolin Genepy, ginger, jalapeno, lime, citrus salt

menuItems.title: Bitterly Beloved
menuItems.description: Reposado tequila, Devil-made grapefruit cinnamon syrup, Campari, lime, saline, egg white.
menuItems.tagLine: Bitterly beloved we are gathered here tonight to revel in the frothy pink goodness that is this drink.

menuItems.title: Saint Paul's Bones (on draft!)
menuItems.description: Rye whiskey, aged rum, Cynar, Luxardo Maraschino liqueur, clove, Maldon sea salt, orange zest

menuItems.title: Abanoble Snowman
menuItems.description: El Silencio Mezcal, Amaro Abano, Amontillado, ginger, honey, lemon, cinnamon.

menuItems.title: No Rest For The Wicked (on draft!)
menuItems.description: Mezcal, Contratto Bitter, Perc coffee liqueur, Sweet Vermouth, Devil-made crème de cacao, mole bitters.

menuItems.title: Underberg
menuItems.description: Bitter German herbal digestif

subMenus.title: Atonements (sans alcohol)
subMenus.tagLine: (It's your normal life, you just aren't hungover)

menuItems.title: Mamma Ghia (how could I resist you?)
menuItems.description: Ghia non-alcoholic aperitif, New London Light n/a gin, acid adjusted orange juice, agave, lemon.

menuItems.title: The City Special
menuItems.description: Devil-made cinnamon & BRIO coffee syrup, condensed milk, vanilla, star anise, Mexican Coca-Cola.

menuItems.title: Spritz-SIN the Night Away
menuItems.description: Pentire Coastal, rosemary, blood orange, Q tonic.

menuItems.title: Wrong Island Iced Tea
menuItems.description: Pathfinder 'Amaro', Pentire Seaward 'spirit', Wilfred's NA Bitter, lemon, splash of Mexican Coca-Cola.

menuItems.title: NArgarita
menuItems.description: Pentire Adrift ‘spirit’, fresh lime juice, agave, citrus salt

menuItems.title: Leave the Light On
menuItems.description: Wilfred’s NA Bitter, Lyre’s NA Orange Liqueur, TÖST NA sparkling ‘wine’, seltzer, magic

menuItems.title: Hot Buttered YUM
menuItems.description: Flor de Cana 5yr Rum, salted butter, cocoa, brown sugar, cinnamon, marshmallows.

menuItems.title: The Marrakesh Express
menuItems.description: Espresso, Moroccan spiced milk syrup, Flor de Cana 5yr Rum, Pierre Ferrand Dry Curacao

menuItems.title: La-di-da-di We Like to Toddy
menuItems.description: Northern Spy Apple-butter-cinnamon-infused Jameson, Laird’s Straight Apple Brandy, lemon, apple syrup, Peychaud’s bitters.

menuItems.title: Devils Beans (vg)
menuItems.description: Crispy chili lime garbanzo beans

menuItems.title: Marinated Olives (vg, gf)
menuItems.description: Citrus and herb marinated Moroccan and Italian olives with spicy cherry bomb peppers

menuItems.title: Bread + Butter (v)
menuItems.description: August First country loaf, sun dried tomato butter, garlic oil, sea salt.

menuItems.title: Deviled Eggs (3)
menuItems.description: XO sauce (shellfish sauce), scallion, sesame seed OR chili crisp (vegetarian)

menuItems.title: Crispy Tuna Squares (gf)
menuItems.description: Fried sushi rice cake, marinated cucumbers, spicy tuna, crispy ginger, tobikko

menuItems.title: Waffle Fries
menuItems.description: Tajin dusted, mojo mayo

menuItems.title: Mushroom Toast (v)
menuItems.description: Roasted mushrooms, caramelized onions, burrata, all the herbs

menuItems.title: Ricotta Toast
menuItems.description: Whipped ricotta, roasted pears, pomegranate, wildflower honey

menuItems.title: Fried Chicken Sandwich
menuItems.description:
Pickles, garlic aioli, shredduce, hot chili relish
+side of cerberus’ ninth circle sauce

menuItems.title: August 1st Brownie
menuItems.description: Devils food frosting, unicorn syrup, raspberry or orange.
